sentence.Network_en: Congressman Tom Downey is a Democrat from New York.

sentence.Network_en: We must, each of us, prevail upon our congressman to act.

entry.tran: (美国)男国会议员，(尤指)男众议员
entry.def: A Congressman is a male member of the US Congress, especially of the House of Representatives.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the United States House of Representatives

sentences.en: He related several anecdotes about his first years as a congressman.
sentences.cn: 他讲述自己初任议员那几年的几则轶事。
